original_query: SELECT MIN(v.Id) FROM votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = v.UserId AND v.UserId = b.UserId AND u.DownVotes>=0 AND u.DownVotes<=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.DownVotes = 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.UserId=E3.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E2E3.UserId)
